items.title: In Trump’s crowded White House, JD Vance finds a role behind the scenes
items.description: The vice president has balanced his love for public-facing mudslinging with a quieter portfolio as conciliator and backroom dealmaker.

items.title: Democrats are focusing on Musk as the main villain in the new Trump era
items.description: The Democratic Party is taking advantage of Elon Musk’s low approval ratings to tie him to unpopular Trump cutbacks in federal services.

items.title: Former Social Security official describes hostile takeover by Musk team
items.description: DOGE officials also put millions of taxpayers’ private data at risk and refused to say why they needed access to it, the official says.
